title: Is That Church Built on a Big Personality or Jesus?
description:
Magnetic. Inspiring. Charismatic. Visionary. God-given personality gifts or problems waiting to happen? 

Big personalities are attractive, and bad things happen when a church is built more on the big personality of the pastor than Jesus. But actually... that's true of any personality type.

Show Links:

When Big Personalities Lead Big Churches
